headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts and Double GTA$ & RP Opportunities
content:
Take advantage of some enticing discounts including:

-All Yachts – 30% off
-Yacht Renovations – 30% off
-Ocelot Pariah (Sports) – 30% off
-Ocelot XA-21 (Super) – 30% off
-The Doomsday Heist clothing – 25% off

Plus, team up with Nervous Ron and head skyward to earn Double GTA$ & RP on Smuggler's Run Sell Missions, or for the road warriors who prefer getting by on two wheels, earn 25% more GTA$ on all Biker Business Sales.

And much more. Check out the Rockstar Newswire for all the details.
